verses.verse: And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>; as a <S%H1532>barber<s%>'s <S%H8593>razor<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> it unto <S%H5674>thee<s%>, and shalt cause it to pass upon thy <S%H7218>head<s%> and upon thy <S%H2206>beard<s%>: then <S%H3947>take<s%> thee <S%H3976>balances<s%> to <S%H4948>weigh<s%>, and divide the <S%H2505>hair<s%>.

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> shalt thou <S%H1197>burn<s%> in the <S%H217>fire<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4692>siege<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7992>it<s%>; and a third part thou shalt <S%H2219>scatter<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> thereof a <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>, and <S%H6696>bind<s%> them in thy <S%H3671>skirts<s%>.

And of these <S%H3947>again<s%> shalt thou <S%H7993>take<s%>, and cast them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them in the <S%H784>fire<s%>; therefrom shall a <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> into all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: This is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; I have <S%H7760>set<s%> her in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H776>countries<s%> are round about <S%H5439>her<s%>.

And she hath <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> in doing <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and against my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> more than the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3988>her<s%>; for they have rejected mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and as for my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, they have not walked in <S%H1980>them<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Because ye are <S%H1995>turbulent<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and have not walked in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, neither have <S%H6213>kept<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, neither have <S%H6213>done<s%> after the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round about <S%H5439>you<s%>;

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H6213>Behold<s%>, I, even I, am against thee; and I will execute <S%H4941>judgments<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
And I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in thee that which I have not <S%H6213>done<s%>, and whereunto I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> any more the <S%H3282>like<s%>, because of all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1121>thee<s%>, and the sons shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H7611>thee<s%>; and the whole remnant of thee will I <S%H2219>scatter<s%> unto all the <S%H7307>winds<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2930>surely<s%>, because thou hast defiled my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> with all thy detestable <S%H8251>things<s%>, and with all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, therefore will I also <S%H1639>diminish<s%> <S%H5869>thee<s%>; neither shall mine eye <S%H2347>spare<s%>, and I also will have no <S%H2550>pity<s%>.

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> of thee shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and with <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall they be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7992>thee<s%>; and a third part shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7992>thee<s%>; and a third part I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> unto all the <S%H7307>winds<s%>, and will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.

Thus shall mine <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished<s%>, and I will cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> toward them to <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and I shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H7068>zeal<s%>, when I have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> my wrath upon <S%H2534>them<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H2723>desolation<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5869>thee<s%>, in the sight of all that pass <S%H5674>by<s%>.

So it shall be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H1422>taunt<s%>, an <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and an <S%H4923>astonishment<s%>, unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>, when I shall execute <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on thee in <S%H639>anger<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and in <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes<s%>; <S%H3068>(I<s%>, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>;)

when I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> upon them the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>, that are for <S%H4889>destruction<s%>, which I will <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3254>you<s%>: and I will increase the <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon <S%H7665>you<s%>, and will break your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>;

and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> upon you <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%>, and they shall <S%H7921>bereave<s%> <S%H1698>thee<s%>; and pestilence and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H935>thee<s%>; and I will bring the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H3068>thee<s%>: I, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
